short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your web browsing with Ekorn Search, enabling quick access to websites and resources through intuitive shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert your browser into your terminal. Streamline your web browsing with Ekorn's search engine, enabling quick access to websites and resources through intuitive shortcuts.

üìπ See the demo here https://ekorn.xyz

üí™ How it works?
Type in your browser `yt kittens` to search in youtube videos about cats.
Want to know the location of an address? Type `gm <the-address>` to go to Google Maps.
See all the list of commands by typing `list`.

üõ†Ô∏è Use it at work! Customize your commands
Ekorn is specially powerful at work. Add your own commands to quickly access/search in tools such as Confluence, Github, customer CRMs, financial tools or anything that has a website and a search method.

üëÄ What changes you may expect?
We will set your default search engine to be Ekorn and only that, but worry not! You won't lose Google, any unrecognized command will lead to Google, so we map the command you enter to the correct website/URL.

‚úãüèº We respect your privacy
We won't log your raw searches, as per our policy (https://ekorn.xyz/privacy) we will only log the necessary data to ensure we can offer the service and improve the quality of them.
